title: Beaten paths;
author: Thompson
snippet: The River Esk makes a deep and precipitous ravine through the length of the estate.

title: Sunny memories of foreign lands.
author: Stowe, Harriet Beecher
snippet: It is an old castellated house, perched on the airy verge of a precipice, directly over the beautiful River Esk, looking down one of the most romantic glens in Scotland.

title: Sunny memories of foreign lands.
author: Stowe, Harriet Beecher
snippet: It is a most romantic spot, on the banks of the River Esk, now the seat of Sir James Walker Drummond.
